short_summary: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires services in operating and maintaining a remote location spawning channel located within Agassiz BC.
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires services in operating and maintaining a remote location spawning channel located within Agassiz BC.
duration_in_months: While the website description doesn't explicitly state the duration, but the expected end of contract date is September 30, 2027, which implies that the contract began on June 23, 2023. The duration would be approximately 48 months.
full_summary:
**Weaver Creek Spawning Channel Tender Announcement**
==============================================


### Brief Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites bids for the provision of operational and maintenance services for the remote location spawning channel at Weaver Creek, Agassiz, BC.

### Solicitation Number

*   Solicitation Number: 30004397
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Reference Number: CB-6209-35945150

### Tender Closing Date and Time

*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-22
*   Time: 13:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

### Expected Contract Dates

*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-23
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2027-09-30

### Notice Type

*   Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

### Trade Agreements and Regions

*   Trade Agreements: [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://www.international.gc.ca/trade-commerce/trade-agreements-accords-commerciaux/agreements-conventions/cfta-alec.aspx)
*   Regions of Opportunity: British Columbia
*   Regions of Delivery: Canada

### Contact Information

Terri Jones, Contracting Authority

*   Email: [terri.jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:terri.jones@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 15064613743

Attachments
------------

The documents detailing this solicitation can be found in the links below.

*   English: [30004397-ACAN-EN.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6209/30004397-acan-en.pdf)
*   French: [30004397-ACAN-FR.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6209/30004397-acan-fr.pdf)

### Disclaimer

The language of work must be English. Bidders must carefully review the solicitation documents and adhere to the requirements and instructions outlined within.

Estimated Words:  338 

References
